release_notes: Initial MotorMates release with server connectivity
instructions: Step 1: Update iOS App Configuration
- Open your MotorMates iOS project in Xcode
- Navigate to your API configuration file
- Update the base URL to: https://golfai.duckdns.org:8443/motormates
- This uses the same server as GolfSwingAI
Step 2: Handle SSL Certificate
- For development, allow arbitrary loads in Info.plist
- Add NSAppTransportSecurity exception for your server
- Or install the SSL certificate on your iOS device
Step 3: Test Connection
- Build and run the app
- Test the connection using the /motormates/test-ios endpoint
- Verify you receive: 'MotorMates server is connected!'
Step 4: Implement Authentication
- Use /motormates/auth/register for new users
- Use /motormates/auth/login for existing users
- Store the returned JWT token for authenticated requests
Step 5: Core Features
- Posts: Create and view automotive content
- Routes: Share and discover driving routes
- Garage: Manage your car collection
Step 6: GitHub Updates
- Push code changes to: https://github.com/nakulb23/MotorMates
- Tag releases with semantic versioning (e.g., v1.0.0)
- Update this file for new app versions
